tool_description: Track and manage your investment holdings wallet effortlessly with this API, offering detailed information on funds and their holdings.
name: Wallet Portfolio Balance
title: Wallet Portfolio Balance

api_list.name: wallet
api_list.description: Monitor your asset allocation and investment portfolio health with our API, delivering accurate and up-to-date fund holding information.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://wallet-portfolio-balance.p.rapidapi.com/0xc32b7438b3df7844c9ee799930a2224fe6e26426"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "wallet-portfolio-balance.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://wallet-portfolio-balance.p.rapidapi.com/{wallet}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "wallet-portfolio-balance.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
